item.title: NZ could be at level 1 by next Wednesday
item.description:
New Zealand could move to level 1 in just eight days' time if all goes well, the Prime Minister says.
Jacinda Ardern said this morning that at next Monday's Cabinet meeting the decision could be made ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

enclosure.url: https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202023/SCCZEN_A_010620NZHDPPROTEST4_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=A lack of social distancing and few masks worn at yesterday's Black Lives Matter protests have raised fears of another outbreak of Covid-19. Photo / Dean Purcell

item.nzh-sem:metakeywords: Freemans Bay, Auckland Region, National, Premium, Crime, Drug Abuse, Mental Health
item.title: 'Left to die': Pensioner who survived savage beating now battling health system
item.description:
By all accounts Mike Reilly should be dead.
The pensioner and former country musician was attacked "out of the blue" while visiting a mate in Freemans Bay in July 2018.
Alo Ngata, a complete stranger ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

enclosure.url: https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202022/SCCZEN_21052020NZHSWreilly05_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Mike Reilly was the victim of a random and brutal attack in Freemans Bay in 2018. Photo / File

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202023/mikereilly_70x70.jpeg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Former country musician Mike Reilly was left for dead after a brutal unprovoked beating in Freemans Bay in 2018. Photo / Supplied

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202022/SCCZEN_A_050718NZHGBPOLICE4_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Police Superintendent Karyn Malthus addresses media after Alo Ngata died in hospital following his arrest. Photo / File

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202022/SCCZEN_A_040718NZHASARREST1_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Police arrest a Alo Ngata in Beresford St, Freemans Bay after the attack. Ngata later died in hospital. Photo / File

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202022/SCCZEN_A_050718SPLNGATA1_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Alo Ngata died in hospital three days after being repeatedly tasered by police following a shocking attack on a defenceless pensioner. Photo / File

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202022/SCCZEN_21052020NZHSWreilly01_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Tom Reilly's father Mike was attacked by a crazed man in July 2018 who later died in hospital after being tasered four times by police. Photo / File

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202022/SCCZEN_21052020NZHSWreilly08_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Mike Reilly was beaten to within an inch of his life and says he has not been able to walk since the attack. Photo / File
